miya yana wita ohu 89 wiye pasuwiya.waidya prathikara labaganima sandaha nithara nitharama chinayata giya sihanuk raju tika welawakin pasuwa ohu miya gos atha.wayasgatha thaththwaya ha saukhya thaththwaya gana salakamin siya puthuta idademin ohu raja padawiyen iwathye 2004 okthobar masayeya.kamboja rupawahiniyen prakashayata path niwedanayakin kiyawune kamboja rajakiya rajaya wisin chinayen ohuge dehaya nompen aganagarayata gena enu labana bawath rajakiya maligayedi rate sampradayata anuwa awamangalothsawaya pawathwana bawa thya.sihanuk ge awasana kalaye ohu pilikawa, diyawadiyawa,adhirudhira pidanaya ha hrudayabadha wani roga rasakin pelemin siti bawa sandahanya.sihanuk 1941 raja padawiyata pathwuye 18 wani wiyediya.

e mathuda nowa, nama shakruthi niwaradi kirimata piyawara noganima nisa , eewa thahawuru wiya.eeniya demala nijabim sankalpaya mal palaganwima udesa, mema depalathe aithihasika sinhala sthana - nama demalakaranayata lakwi, ese wikruthi kala ayurinma pawathimata ha bhawithayata ida hara thibima kanagatuwata karunaki.uthuru ha nangenahira palath deka ekkota, demala - tha්rasthayan lawa eeniya demala - nijabim sankalpaya jayagena, demala eelamayak atawime kumantha්ranayata demala - eelam karayin wisin meki sthana - nama wikruthiya pawichchi karanu labana ayuru dakiya haki ya.poduwe oonama deyak siduwannata ida hara, “ohe oona deyak wuna den” yayi karabagena, indime pa්rathiwipaka dan windawannata siduwi thibe.uthurukaraye bauddha siddhasthanapasugiya wasare agosthu masaye nangenahira pedeshi kala arakgena siti el.ti.ti.ee tha්rasthawadihu gokanna (sirigonakanda hewath thi්rakunamalaya eepadadajadhathachathagnyagnya) disthi්rakkaye ganthalawen (kanthale) obbehi, somapura pa්radeshaye janathawata paniya ha gowithan sandaha jalaya sapayu mawil - oye sorowu awahira kalaha.demala janathawage eeniya “galawumkarayin” yayi kiyaganna meki demala tha්rasthayo, sinhala saha muslim janaya mathu nowa, dahas ganan wu thama demala jathikayin da, menayin dadi pidanayata goduru kalaha.waha ki්rayathmaka wu, deshaye mura - dewathawan bandu aarakshaka hamuda wisin darunu satan wada, demala tha්rasthayan palawa harina ladaha.anathuruwa kotin ge pidanayata path ema pedes wasi dahas sankhyatha demala, sinhala, muslim aa sakala janathawage pan pawasa niwamin, agosthu 9 wanida rathi්ra 8.00 ta ape wirodara sebala balaani wisin mawil - oye sorowu arina ladi.
